meanings.definition: A dish, usually of earthenware, glass, or cast iron, in which food is baked and served.
meanings.sent1: My mom made a delicious casserole for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The casserole was bubbling hot when it came out of the oven.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the casserole dish, but luckily it didn't break.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the casserole filled the entire kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The casserole was so tasty that everyone asked for seconds.

meanings.definition: Food, such as a stew, cooked in such a dish.
meanings.sent1: The potluck had a variety of delicious casseroles to choose from.
meanings.sent2: She brought a hearty casserole to the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The casserole looked so good that I couldn't resist taking a second helping.
meanings.sent4: The warm casserole was a comforting meal on a cold winter night.
meanings.sent5: The casserole was the star of the dinner party, everyone loved it.
